sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Hackathons = () => { // This would typically come from your backend const hackathons = [ { id: 1, title: 'Global AI Innovation Challenge', description: 'Build innovative AI solutions for real-world problems', date: 'March 1-3, 2025', image: '/hackathon-1.jpg', participants: 500, prize: '$10,000', location: 'Virtual' }, { id: 2, title: 'Sustainable Tech Hackathon', description: 'Create solutions for environmental sustainability', date: 'March 15-17, 2025', image: '/hackathon-2.jpg', participants: 300, prize: '$5,000', location: 'Hybrid' }, // Add more hackathons... ]; return (

Upcoming Hackathons

{hackathons.map((hackathon) => (

{hackathon.title}

{hackathon.description}

Date

{hackathon.date}

Location

{hackathon.location}

Participants

{hackathon.participants}

Prize Pool

{hackathon.prize}

Learn More
))}
); }; export default Hackathons;
